scripts.pluginstall: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugins add org.apache.cordova.console@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.device@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.dialogs@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.file@0.2.4 org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.network-information@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.statusbar && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.file-transfer@0.3.3 && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin add https://github.com/SpiderOak/FileViewerPlugin.git
scripts.plugremove: ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugins remove org.apache.cordova.console@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.device@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.dialogs@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.file@0.2.4 org.apache.cordova.inappbrowser@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.network-information@0.2.3 org.apache.cordova.statusbar && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove org.apache.cordova.file-transfer@0.3.3 && ./node_modules/.bin/cordova plugin remove https://github.com/SpiderOak/FileViewerPlugin.git
